Datasheet.Intro: The Composition Engine bridges the gap between raw data (XML) and professional documents (PDF). It is designed to process massive datasets efficiently, producing pixel-perfect documents using HTML templates and headless browser rendering. Stop fighting with archaic formats like XSL-FO or proprietary tools. Build your invoices, statements, and reports using the web technologies you already know.

Feature.Title: High Fidelity Rendering
Feature.Description: Uses a headless browser (Puppeteer) to render full HTML/CSS, ensuring your PDFs look exactly like your web templates. What you see is what you get.

Feature.Title: Handlebars Templates
Feature.Description: Full support for logic ({{#if}}, {{#each}}) and formatting helpers (formatCurrency, formatDate) to handle complex data requirements.

Feature.Title: Scalable Streaming
Feature.Description: Processes gigabyte-sized XML files with millions of records without loading the entire file into memory. Flat memory usage regardless of input size.

Feature.Title: Flexible Output Modes
Feature.Description: Generate individual PDF files for each record (Multi Mode) or combine all records into a single giant PDF (Single Mode).

Feature.Title: High Concurrency
Feature.Description: Parallel processing maximizes CPU usage and throughput by utilizing a robust pool of browser instances.

Feature.Title: Dynamic Charts
Feature.Description: Embed data-driven charts directly in your documents.

Requirements.Requirement: Google Chrome, Chromium, or Microsoft Edge
Minimum 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for high concurrency)

Tier.Name: Developer
Tier.Description: Open Source (MIT License). Perfect for local development and small projects.

Tier.Name: Enterprise
Tier.Description: Dedicated support, SLA, and custom integration services.
